project.name: FUSE Message Broker (e'prise ActiveMQ)
project.description:
FUSE Message Broker is an open source, enterprise version of Apache ActiveMQ. This enterprise release is tested, certified and supported.
FUSE Message Broker is a JMS platform providing high performance, unlimited scalability, and mission-critical reliability for distributed enterprise computing. FUSE Message Broker is a cost-effective and flexible messaging platform for reliably executing transactions and moving data, efficiently scaling operations, and connecting processes across heterogeneous database and application environments.
FUSE Message Broker supports JMS 1.1 and many integration-related standards including JDBC, JCA, and EJBs; dependent specifications such as JTA and JNDI; as well as AJAX, REST, HTTP, TCP, SSL, NIO, UDP, multicast, JGroups and JXTA transport protocols.
